name: Houston, we have a delay!
description:
Your ship is on a mission to an alien planet! Control it from Earth, and guide it safely through the dangers of space. But beware of delay!

This game was an entry for the Global Game Jam 2018.

Development team:

  • Khin Baptista (programming and development)
  • Marcelo Vasques (programming and development)
  • Rubens Rodrigues (2d art)
  • Vinicius Meirelles (3d art)
